column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I get my hair cut by a person I met when my kids were in preschool with her kids .
#text=She is the best hair cutter I 've ever been to .
#text=She works at a nice salon , although she used to cut hair for cheaper out of her home .
#text=Now when I go to get a haircut , I call the salon to make an appointment .
#text=When I arrive at the salon , I check in with the receptionist and she asks whether I want to wear a tunic .
#text=-LRB- You can take off your top and wear one of their tunics if you want to be sure you do n't get hair on your top . -RRB-
#text=I used to , but now I do n't because the tunics are uncomfortable .
#text=Usually the receptionist asks whether I want a glass of lemon water or a cup of tea .
#text=Then I sit down on one of the couches in the waiting area and read a fashion magazine and sip my water while I wait for my appointment time .
#text=The person who cuts my hair comes out to the waiting area to get me when it 's time .
#text=She puts a big plastic cape around my neck and washes my hair at a sink .
#text=She gives me a scalp massage , which always feels great .
#text=Then she wraps my head in a towel and we walk to her hair cutting station .
#text=I have to take my glasses off , so everything is very blurry .
#text=First I stand up behind the chair and she cuts the hair at the nape of my neck .
#text=Then I sit down and she cuts the rest .
#text=After the haircut , she blow-dries my hair gently and arranges the curls so that they look good .
#text=Then she gives me a hand mirror , and I put my glasses on to see what the haircut looks like .
#text=While I look at it , she sweeps up the hair from the floor .
#text=Then she walks me back out to the reception area , and I pay for the haircut .
